name: Unified Font Size for Tumblr Dashboard
description: The base code is set to unify all instances of small, sub, super, and doublesmall font sizes to the default font size. This will not affect the line spacing when these fonts are used, but it will allow you to have your dash displayed at your preferred font size.
additional_info:
JULY 2020 UPDATED for new dashboard coding - screencaps outdated; lines of text will mirror standard text in line height

---

UPDATED [June 2020] with fix for line spacing when changing small/sub/super/doublesmall font sizes to default font sizes. Lines are now uniform with default text formatting. (not reflected in the screencaps)

--

In the event that you want or need the fonts to be larger or smaller, simply change all instances of font-size:14px; to your preferred font size. Smaller fonts default to 12px; or 10px; - font sizes can be set even larger for those with vision impairments who may need the larger font size for ease of readability.
